name: create-js-package
description: Create a JS package with es6, testing, linting, and publication tools included

scripts.prerelease: npm run lint && npm test && npm run check-coverage
scripts.release:patch: npm run prerelease && changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run prerelease && changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm run prerelease && changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push --follow-tags
